Name: training
Title: Training | AidIQ.com
Body:
Training and Workshops

Workshops

We can facilitate workshops between stakeholders to help determine what everyone wants from a new system

User Training

Training can be provided to the End Users. We include lots of Hands-on exercises & Testing to ensure that skills are usable.

Technical Training

Training can also be provided to the Technical staff: Developers and/or Systems Administrators

Case Studies

  • BPKEL. Information Management Workshop
  • Give2LA. Trained Developers & System Administrators to maintain the system
  • RGIMS. Trained Developers to maintain the system
  • SahanaCamp Taiwan
  • SahanaCamp Turkey
